channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 06/27/2024 # Bugfix # Resolved the issue where the bot could not properly end a meeting and start a new one if it left due to reasons such as “not being permitted to join the meeting” or “no conversation in the meeting”. Fixed the issue causing new users to repeat the registration process due to “login and registration process optimization.” 06/20/2024 # New Features and Performance Optimization # Optimized the login and registration process.
